text: Jeepers Creepers is a horror movie which also had sequels. It was directed by Victor Salva with Gina Phillips and Justin Long. It made 59 plus million at box office. Jonathan Breck played the creeper. Category:2001 horror movies Category:American horror movies Category:German horror movies Category:MGM movies Category:Movies directed by Victor Salva Category:Movies about siblings
title: Jeepers Creepers (2001 movie)
